sentence.Network_en: If that weren't true, I may have squeamishly helped out at Special Olympics once or twice.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果不是这样, 我也许几次在残奥会上做助手时会战战兢兢.

sentences.sentence: "`I would rather not touch,' he said squeamishly"

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
